objections.name: Vague and Ambiguous
objections.formal_language: Responding Party objects to this Request as vague and ambiguous.
objections.argument_template: The terms used in this Request are susceptible to multiple interpretations and fail to provide Responding Party with adequate notice of what is sought.

objections.name: Overbroad
objections.formal_language: Responding Party objects to this Request as overbroad in scope.
objections.argument_template: This Request, as phrased, encompasses materials and information beyond the scope of proper discovery in this action and is not proportional to the needs of the case.

objections.name: Unduly Burdensome
objections.formal_language: Responding Party objects to this Request as unduly burdensome and oppressive.
objections.argument_template: Compliance with this Request would require an unreasonable expenditure of time and resources disproportionate to the needs of this case and the likely benefit of the information sought.

objections.name: Attorney-Client Privilege
objections.formal_language: Responding Party objects to this Request to the extent it seeks information protected by the attorney-client privilege.
objections.argument_template: The requested materials include confidential communications between Responding Party and legal counsel made for the purpose of obtaining legal advice, which are privileged and protected from disclosure.

objections.name: Work Product Doctrine
objections.formal_language: Responding Party objects to this Request to the extent it seeks materials protected by the attorney work product doctrine.
objections.argument_template: The requested materials include documents prepared in anticipation of litigation or for trial by or for Responding Party's attorneys, which are protected from disclosure under the work product doctrine.

objections.name: Not Relevant
objections.formal_language: Responding Party objects to this Request as seeking information not relevant to the subject matter of this action and not proportional to the needs of the case.
objections.argument_template: The information sought is not relevant to any party's claim or defense and is not reasonably calculated to lead to the discovery of admissible evidence.

objections.name: Compound
objections.formal_language: Responding Party objects to this Request as compound.
objections.argument_template: This Request contains multiple discrete sub-parts and categories that should be propounded as separate requests for production.

objections.name: Assumes Facts Not in Evidence
objections.formal_language: Responding Party objects to this Request as assuming facts not in evidence.
objections.argument_template: This Request is premised on disputed factual assertions that Responding Party does not accept as true and which have not been established in this action.

objections.name: Proprietary/Confidential
objections.formal_language: Responding Party objects to this Request to the extent it seeks proprietary, confidential, or trade secret information.
objections.argument_template: The requested materials contain proprietary business information, trade secrets, or other confidential information that requires protection from disclosure.

objections.name: Already Produced/Available
objections.formal_language: Responding Party objects to this Request as seeking documents already produced or equally available to the propounding party.
objections.argument_template: The documents sought have already been produced in this litigation or are equally available to the propounding party from other sources.
